response.overview: Episode 1: Misa, who has a dissociative disorder because of her father, finally gets married to her current husband, Yuu's father. Her married life, which she thought she would be so happy with, is short-lived, and a new personality emerges in order to escape from the trauma of her past. Her personality is different, wanting more stimulation from her, and she makes her Misa a woman full of lusciousness, and when she sees the shape of Misa, Yuu's friend Akira gets excited. The next night, another personality of Misa reappears, and she enters her stepson Yuu's room, possessed by something, and attacks him.  Episode 2: Haruko, who thought Masaru was friendly with her son Akira, took good care of her. However, Masaru is a friend tormenting Akira, and he reaches out to her friend's mother. However, she also feels the touch of a man she hasn't felt in a long time, so she knows that he is her son's friend, but she can't shake it off, and she develops a secret relationship with Masaru.
response.title: Mother-in-law's incest
